original_title: Death of a Beatle: John Lennon
overview: Death of a Beatle, an extraordinary documentary film featuring respected journalist and biographer Jack Jones, celebrates the remarkable life of the 20th century icon while investigating the motivations, forensic evidence and tragic final actions that forever linked John Lennon to Mark David Chapman; the deranged man who shot and killed Lennon on December 8, 1980 outside his home in New York City
title: Death of a Beatle: John Lennon
